name: Niplheim's Hunter - Branded Azel
description: Play as the hunter girl Azel and battle monsters with equipment made of their corpses while searching for the Black Demon Beast that branded her.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10/8/7/Vista/XP/2000 Processor: 2Ghz Memory: 1 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10/8/7/Vista/XP/2000 Processor: 2Ghz Memory: 1 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space
